data.description: This is a public service website published by Mbeya Highlands FM as part of our mission to give citizens potentially life-saving information. The website offers open data tools to help you find medical assistance, as well as the latest available alerts and information about cholera outbreaks from Mbeya Highland FMâ€™s newsroom, as well as other sources. This OUTBREAK website was built by Code for Tanzania, using the Proto platform, as part of the Data Zetu initiative, on behalf of Mbeya Highlands FM.
